description: This scene is one for the record books - a giant fisting chainconsisting of six (6!!!) men - four insatiable bottoms lined up,bookended by French fuckers Francois Sagat and Taurus! Ourbottoms are Matthieu Paris, Cristiano, Javier de Cerdo, and ChrisNeal - all pro players who love fisting and getting fisted at the sametime! It's a daisy chain from the start as the camera pans the length ofthe action. Believe us when we say that it is a real sight to behold thismany guys fisting each other all in the same wide shot! Francois andTaurus then start at one end of the chain and slowly work their wayforward, meaning that each guy gets a total of six hands - and in eachcase the bottom being fisted is also topping the guy infront of him! Chris Ward has outdone himself on this one!
title: Fistpack 8 - Elbow Room, Scene #05
